articles.title: Raphael Saadiq wants Moon Girl and Devil Dinosaur’s music to move you
articles.description: Ahead of Moon Girl and Devil Dinosaur’s February 10th Disney Channel debut, executive music producer Raphael Saadiq sat down with The Verge to discuss the show’s musical influences.
articles.content: When I watched cartoons as a kid, there was a lot of serious orchestration. A lot of funk, a lot of R&B, and a lot of soul all kinds of different styles of music. I wanted that for Moon Girl, too… [+4718 chars]
